definitions.definition: The citizens of China , particularly citizens of the People's Republic of China .
examples: The Chinese have an incredible history.

definitions.definition: The Han Chinese , whether in China or overseas .
examples: The Chinese are present in all parts of the world.

definitions.definition: The Standard Chinese language , written in Chinese characters and spoken and spelled using Standard Mandarin pronunciation .
examples: 你好 is read “ Nǐ hǎo ” and means “ Hello ” in Chinese .

definitions.definition: The branch of the Sino-Tibetan language family including Mandarin , Cantonese , Shanghainese , Southern Min , and other closely related language varieties and dialects .
examples: Suzhounese and Hakka are lesser-known varieties of Chinese .

definitions.definition: The logographic writing system shared by most Sinitic languages .
examples: Hong Kong still uses traditional Chinese .
